testsuite.name: Testing different requests like CREATE, READ, UPDATE and DELETE on Products Endpoint of the BestBuy API playground application.

testcase.name: Check if the Products data can be accessed by user
Check if user can CREATE a new category on products endpoint
Check if user can READ a newly created category on products endpoint
Check if user can UPDATE a newly created product on products endpoint
Check if user can delete a newly created product on products end point
